column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The pizza itself is so packed with stuff
column2: it's ridiculous.  There's tons of cheese
column3: tomatoes and tomato sauce.  The crust is impecable with a crunchy and buttery taste.  Just be warned though
column5: you might get food coma.  All 3 of us got food coma after eating 1-2 slices of the "Lou
column6: and ended up having to call it a night.  But, the pizza itself was delicious.  Highly recommend it if you're visiting Chicago.
